name: jquery-jsonrpcclient
description: JSON-RPC 2.0 Client for HTTP and WebSocket backend

scripts.test: karma start --single-run --browsers PhantomJS test/unit.conf.js && cat coverage/*/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm cat coverage/*/lcov.info
